internalIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier of this device that is used by the operators in reports, documentation or data annotation.

manufacturer._instruction: The manufacturer or supplier providing the item. If it is self-made please state the name of the person that manufactures it.

modelName._instruction: The full name of this particular model as stated from the manufacturer.

modelIdentifier._instruction: Please indicate any persistent identifier asosiated with this device

serialNumber._instruction: specific for the model, provided by the manufacturer or institution.

owner._instruction: Institution(s) or person responsible for the management of the instrument. This may include the legal owner, the operator, or an institute providing access to the instrument.

inventoryNumber._instruction: Add the institutional inventory number (if it differs from the internal identifier).

description._instruction: Enter a description of this device.

software._instruction: Add all software versions that can control this device.

deviceProperties._instruction: Add the non-changeable device property for this device.
